main event: Multiple UFO sightings were reported near Ogallala, Nebraska, in March 1958. Witnesses described seeing bright, metallic, and ellipsoid-shaped objects moving silently and at high speeds in the sky for extended periods of time.
interesting points: The objects were visible for 15-20 minutes and estimated to be at 10,000-12,000 ft, moving in an undulating course.
Witnesses estimated the speed of the object to be approximately 1,000 mph, much faster than typical aircraft of that time.
One report described an object about 40 to 50 feet in diameter, moving at a high rate of speed and showing extraordinary maneuverability.
Another report mentioned a large bright light or 'glowing mass' traveling rapidly, and the witness attempted to radio the object but received no response.
Observers described the objects as being as bright as newly minted silver dollars and made no noise, displaying unusual characteristics that did not resemble conventional aircraft.
